metadata.Title: CVE-2015-1433 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description:
program/lib/Roundcube/rcube_washtml.php in Roundcube before 1.0.5 does not properly quote strings, which allows remote attackers to conduct cross-site scripting (XSS) attacks via the style attribute in an email.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-1433` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

roundcube - 1.3.6+dfsg.1-1
roundcube-core - 1.3.6+dfsg.1-1
roundcube-mysql - 1.3.6+dfsg.1-1
roundcube-pgsql - 1.3.6+dfsg.1-1
roundcube-plugins - 1.3.6+dfsg.1-1
roundcube-sqlite3 - 1.3.6+dfsg.1-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: roundcube package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.3.6+dfsg.1-1').
